entities.description: Strong urge to use marijuana or any cannabis product in the past 12 months.
Need to use a lot more marijuana to get the feeling you want.
Same amount of marijuana has a much less effect than it used to.
Wanted to use marijuana or any cannabis product so badly that you couldn't think of anything else in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Indicates the respondent had a strong urge to use marijuana in the past 12 months.
Indicates the respondent needed to use a lot more marijuana to get the desired feeling.
Indicates that the same amount of marijuana had much less effect than it used to for the respondent.
Indicates the respondent wanted to use marijuana or any cannabis product very badly in the past 12 months.
